snippet: WIESEL--Elie. Moment Magazine mourns the passing of Nobel Prize laureate Elie Wiesel, co-founder of Moment in 1975. His commitment to Jewish life lives on in its pages. Nadine Epstein, Editor & Publisher and the Advisory Board of Moment 1/3...
lead_paragraph: WIESEL--Elie. Moment Magazine mourns the passing of Nobel Prize laureate Elie Wiesel, co-founder of Moment in 1975. His commitment to Jewish life lives on in its pages. Nadine Epstein, Editor & Publisher and the Advisory Board of Moment 1/3
